new_example: Dico sempre la verità anche quando può ferire i sentimenti delle persone care

new_example_english: She always says what she thinks without worrying about social consequences of her words

new_example: Voi dite mai bugie innocenti per non ferire i sentimenti degli altri?

new_example_english: We said everything we had in our hearts during that important conversation

new_example: Avete detto cose terribili durante la lite che ora vorreste non aver mai pronunciato?

new_example_english: They said goodbye forever before he left for military service

new_example_english: I always draw natural landscapes when I go on vacation to capture beauty

new_example_english: She draws magnificent portraits that look like photographs due to detail precision

new_example_english: He had fun like a child at the circus that came to town

new_example_english: They had so much fun during carnival with very colorful costumes

new_example_english: I stopped the car to help a family left stranded

new_example_english: They stopped construction work to protect a bird's nest

new_example_english: I finished writing the book I had dreamed of publishing for many years

new_example: Hai finito tutti i compiti delle vacanze o ne hai ancora qualcuno da completare?

new_example_english: He finished mandatory military service with the rank of sergeant

new_example: Hanno finito la maratona nonostante non si fossero allenati abbastanza prima
new_example_english: They finished the marathon despite not having trained enough beforehand

new_example: Fumo sempre una sigaretta dopo i pasti principali anche se so che fa male

new_example_english: She only smokes during parties because she says it relaxes and entertains her

new_example_english: We never smoke at home because we respect the health of all members

new_example: Voi fumate spesso durante le pause di lavoro o avete smesso completamente?
new_example_english: Do you often smoke during work breaks or have you quit completely?

new_example_english: They always smoke outside the restaurant because indoors it's strictly prohibited by law

new_example: Smetterò di fumare definitivamente quando nascerà mio figlio per dare il buon esempio
new_example_english: I will stop smoking permanently when my son is born to set a good example

new_example: Tu smetterai di fumare se il medico ti dirà che è assolutamente necessario?
new_example_english: Will you quit smoking if the doctor tells you it's absolutely necessary?

new_example: Lei smetterà di fumare gradualmente riducendo il numero di sigarette al giorno
new_example_english: She will quit smoking gradually by reducing the number of cigarettes per day

new_example: Non fumeremo mai davanti ai bambini per non influenzarli negativamente
new_example_english: We will never smoke in front of children to not negatively influence them

new_example: Voi smetterete di fumare insieme per sostenervi a vicenda durante il processo?
new_example_english: Will you quit smoking together to support each other during the process?

new_example: Smetteranno di fumare quando capiranno veramente i danni che stanno causando alla salute
new_example_english: They will quit smoking when they truly understand the damage they're causing to health

new_example: Ho smesso di fumare tre anni fa e ora mi sento molto meglio
new_example_english: I quit smoking three years ago and now I feel much better

new_example: Hai mai fumato durante la gravidanza o hai smesso immediatamente?
new_example_english: Did you ever smoke during pregnancy or did you quit immediately?

new_example: Ha fumato per trent'anni prima di decidere di smettere per sempre
new_example_english: He smoked for thirty years before deciding to quit forever

new_example: Abbiamo smesso di fumare insieme durante la stessa settimana per motivarci
new_example_english: We quit smoking together during the same week to motivate each other

new_example: Avete mai fumato solo per curiosità durante l'adolescenza ribelle?
new_example_english: Did you ever smoke just out of curiosity during rebellious adolescence?

new_example: Hanno smesso di fumare dopo aver visto i terribili effetti sui loro genitori
new_example_english: They quit smoking after seeing terrible effects on their parents
